While the doctors and hospital is really good. The wait time runs 2-3 hours. Today in my case , i remained seated in front of reception , they assumed i was elsewhere and doctor left for “pocedure” . Most of the staff went for lunch in front of me , none of them bothered to tell us that doctor is away please go eat , we arrived at 1 on time but kept waiting till 3 pm . When asked when will doctor see me , the response i got is we do not know you’ll have to wait. I understand sometimes it’s an emergency but the courtesy to inform the patient on wait time and next steps is what a patient in need needs. Go with an attitude of constantly reminding and checking on your consultation status otherwise you’ll end up waiting forever.
Didn't explain properly and misguided. Didn't explain the situation well. Even after scaning didn't confirm on pregnancy.

Met her yesterday after taking couple of blood tests which she prescribed during my first time visit.After looking into the reports she said she will do a scan even though an abdominal ultrasound is already done.I was thinking she will do some other scan on abdomen.Nobody told me what the scan is all about and how&where it will be performed  which is a minimum common-sense of doctor to inform a patient.I was screaming hard and crying during the test,but the doctor was not bothered at all and she is explaining me the report when am not in a position to hear.Only after the scan i came to know that is called as an vaginal ultrasound which is an internal examination which is done to check behaviour of ovaries.

My sincere advice to the doctor is please inform the patient about the test you do(especially if it is internal test) and explain them how it will be done and let them know if that will hurt them or cause any bleeding/pain.Ask them if they are comfortable with it else order for an alternative test.
Or If it is really that mandatory,first make them prepare for that and then only perform it.I was crying all the day yesterday due to pain and discomfort which is totally unfair/cruel from your side.Please note that every patient is also a human being.She will order all the kind of tests available in their lab even though it is not that mandatory.She will somehow answer all your queries but exact root cause of the issue will not be known.

We recommend the doctor but the form doesn't allow me to give feedback without a no. 

We have had previous experience with IVF and related processes.  Our initial request was to consult the doctor and discuss donor Egg program and check for availability of the donors.  We were made to go through all the process for first timers and they were even planning to do a scan etc,  ***** **** *** **********  All we needed was a 2 minute interaction with the doctor.  Once we met her,  we were done in a couple of minutes. Other than the doctor, no one else could understand what we wanted.  

The people around need to understand the situation and follow the process accordingly. It took several followups to get to meet the doctor. After giving samples for diagnostics,  we don't have any clarity if we have to show it to the doctor or if they've shown etc. We have to follow up for almost everything. It'll be nice if the team is more pro active. 

It's been 10 days since our visit and we paid the deposit for donor eggs and we don't have any update in that regard.  We expect a callback at least once a week or so and give us the status as it is professional to provide an update.  We understand that there may be a delay in finding the donor but we'd need to be informed of the same.

reply_text:
Hi
Thank you for your review. Infertility case history taking is for a couple hence takes longer and some patients have a huge volume of diagnostic reports and treatment records which all needs to be recorded. This consultation is also done by a post fellowship doctor specialised in infertility. Then there is counseling required regarding evaluation and treatment plans. All of this takes a minimum of 1-1.5 hrs. The decision of this is taken post a scan. Actually you book a consultation slot and come and when you need a scan you will need a new slot as we have continuos scan appointments already but we adjust your slot in between them. Now after scan you need to show that report to me and this is actually another consultation slot being given to you on the same day. Post this the couple will be advised certain investigations and will come back later for report review which is again free within 10days. So all this is not compulsory to be done same day and you can book your appointment for scan at a convenient date and time and again book a slot for review later again. But with Hyderabad traffic your travel time three times will be much more than the time you spent in your first visit. So we have actually given you three appointments with one booking for the day. We are doing all this for your convenience but you can always decide what works best for you.
